text: Kist sitamgortar az on, ki ojoti Parvardigorasro ʙarojas ʙixonand, pas u ʙa'di fahmidan ruj gardonad va korhoi ʙade, ki az pes karda, faromus kunad? Hamono Mo ʙar dili onho parda afkandem, to ojoti Qur'onro nafahmand va gushojasonro kar soxtem, to onro nasunavand. Agar da'vat kuni kofironro ʙa suji hidojat, hargiz roh najoʙand
